PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-01642018-02-21,  ,  ,  ,  CH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of PAUL D. JOHNSTON of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective June 1, 2018, in the place of Harold Bjarnason, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
